snippet.title: [Teaser Trailer] Wastebraver: A Tiny Survival Tale - Roguelite RPG For Playdate + Steamdeck
snippet.description:
https://wastebraver.quest/

Wastebraver is a rogue-like survival game set in a post-apocalyptic fantasy hellscape. Explore a dynamic, randomly generated world where evils beyond imagination haunt your every footstep. Execute abominations and weave through insane encounters as you fight for what little remains of your broken world. In development for the Playdate and Steamdeck.

Wastebraver Info: https://wastebraver.quest/
Wastebraver (Playdate): https://thestrangest.itch.io/wastebraver
Wastebraver (Steadeck + Windows): https://store.steampowered.com/app/1648430/Wastebraver_A_Tiny_Survival_Tale/
Strangest.io: https://strangest.io/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/strangest.io/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/strangestio
Discord: https://discord.gg/GNPFE9msUy
